about_the_game:
Chyss is a turn-based, deck randomizer strategy game where the galaxy’s most brilliant minds clash on a 9x5 board in a game of infinite tactical depth.
Inspired by the ancient Earth game of chess, Chyss was born when aliens discovered a chess set sent into space centuries ago and reimagined it for their intergalactic civilizations.

Demo content:

  • 5 Story Missions: Dive into the lore of Chyss through a campaign filled with short challenges, vibrant characters, and a glimpse into its intergalactic history.

  • Quickplay vs. CPU: Test your skills in quick, strategic matches against an adaptive AI.

  • PvP Multiplayer: Challenge your friends or take on other players to prove your mastery on the 9x5 board of infinite tactical depth. Multiplayer is async, meaning you can leave mid game and come back later to play your turn.
